data.name: CreateDashboardStagingPriority35
ReadCase
data.value: select NUMB, STATUS, STATUS_DATE, CSE_OPEN_DATE, CREATED_TIMESTAMP, INTERSTATE_CASE_ID, NO_JURISDICTION_CD from CKT_CASE where ( ( (STATUS = 'O') and (STATUS_DATE <= @statusDate) ) or ( (STATUS = 'C') and (STATUS_DATE >= @statusDate) ) ) and (NO_JURISDICTION_CD <= ' ') and (NUMB > @numb) order by NUMB

data.name: ReadCaseAssignmentServiceProvider
data.value: select top(1) T1.REASON_CODE, T1.EFFECTIVE_DATE, T1.DISCONTINUE_DATE, T1.CREATED_TIMESTAMP, T1.SPD_ID, T1.OFF_ID, T1.OSP_CODE, T1.OSP_DATE, T1.CAS_NO, T2.SERVICE_PRVDER_ID, T2.USER_ID, T2.ROLE_CODE from CKT_SERVICE_PRVDER T2 join CKT_ASSIGN_CASE T1 on (@casNo = T1.CAS_NO) and (T1.REASON_CODE = 'RSP') and (T1.EFFECTIVE_DATE <= @effectiveDate) and (T1.DISCONTINUE_DATE >= @discontinueDate) and (T2.SERVICE_PRVDER_ID = T1.SPD_ID) order by T1.EFFECTIVE_DATE desc

data.name: ReadDashboardStagingPriority1
data.value: select top(1) REPORT_MONTH, REPORT_LEVEL, REPORT_LEVEL_ID, AS_OF_DATE, CASELOAD_COUNT from CKT_DB_STAGE_PRI35 where (REPORT_MONTH = @reportMonth) and (REPORT_LEVEL = @reportLevel) and (REPORT_LEVEL_ID = @reportLevelId)

data.name: ReadDashboardStagingPriority2
data.value: select REPORT_MONTH, REPORT_LEVEL, REPORT_LEVEL_ID, AS_OF_DATE, CASELOAD_COUNT from CKT_DB_STAGE_PRI35 where (REPORT_MONTH = @reportMonth) and (REPORT_LEVEL in ('AT', 'CA', 'CW'))

data.name: ReadLegalReferralServiceProvider
data.value: select distinct T1.CAS_NUMBER, T1.IDENTIFIER, T1.STATUS_DATE, T1.STATUS, T1.REFERRAL_DATE, T1.CREATED_TIMESTAMP, T1.REFERRAL_REASON_1, T1.REFERRAL_REASON_2, T1.REFERRAL_REASON_3, T1.REFERRAL_REASON_4, T1.COURT_CASE_NO, T1.TRB_ID, T2.SERVICE_PRVDER_ID, T2.USER_ID, T2.ROLE_CODE from CKT_SERVICE_PRVDER T2 with(readuncommitted) join CKT_LEGAL_REFERRAL T1 with(readuncommitted) join CKT_ASSGN_LEG_REF T3 with(readuncommitted) on (@casNumber = T1.CAS_NUMBER) and ( ( (T1.STATUS in ('O', 'S')) and (T1.CREATED_TIMESTAMP <= @createdTimestamp) ) or ( (T1.STATUS in ('C', 'W', 'R')) and (T1.STATUS_DATE >= @statusDate) and (T1.CREATED_TIMESTAMP <= @createdTimestamp) ) ) and (T1.IDENTIFIER = T3.LGR_ID) and (T1.CAS_NUMBER = T3.CAS_NO) and (T3.EFFECTIVE_DATE <= @statusDate) and (T3.DISCONTINUE_DATE >= @discontinueDate) on T2.SERVICE_PRVDER_ID = T3.SPD_ID order by T2.SERVICE_PRVDER_ID, T1.STATUS_DATE desc

data.name: UpdateDashboardStagingPriority1
data.value: update CKT_DB_STAGE_PRI35 set AS_OF_DATE = @asOfDate, CASELOAD_COUNT = @caseloadCount where (REPORT_MONTH = @reportMonth) and (REPORT_LEVEL = @reportLevel) and (REPORT_LEVEL_ID = @reportLevelId)

data.name: UpdateDashboardStagingPriority2
data.value: update CKT_DB_STAGE_PRI35 set CASELOAD_COUNT = @caseloadCount where (REPORT_MONTH = @reportMonth) and (REPORT_LEVEL = @reportLevel) and (REPORT_LEVEL_ID = @reportLevelId)
